name: Italian Pizzeria Pizza Pie Bakery - Food Maker
name_original: Italian Pizzeria Pizza Pie Bakery - Food Maker
description:
Do you like a good old fashioned and traditional pizza pie!? This is the perfect game for you! Create your own pizza with this addictive maker game!

[Features]
•Build your own dough from scratch!
•Make your special red sauce for the pizza!
•Decorate off your pizza with different seasonings, veggies, & MEATS!
•Cut your pizza the way you want!
•Save & share your favorite master piece!





*Please note: This game is free to play, but offers in-game purchases made with real money.
